content.en: Secure Health Records: Researchers are exploring ways to securely share personal health records and electronic health records in cloud computing. They are using algorithms like Blowfish, Searchable Symmetric Encryption (SSE), Attribute-Based Encryption (ABE), and Rijndael method to ensure the security and privacy of the data. These algorithms enable efficient and secure data sharing, fine-grained access control, and policy-hiding in cloud storage, making it possible to develop secure cloud-based frameworks for managing health records.
content.da: Sikkerhed for sundhedsregistre: Forskere undersøger måder at sikkert dele personlige sundhedsregistre og elektroniske patientjournaler i cloud computing. De bruger algoritmer som Blowfish, Searchable Symmetric Encryption (SSE), Attribute-Based Encryption (ABE), og Rijndael-metoden for at sikre datasikkerhed og privatliv. Disse algoritmer muliggør effektiv og sikker datadeling, fintmasket adgangskontrol og politik-skjulning i cloud-lagring, hvilket gør det muligt at udvikle sikre cloud-baserede rammer til håndtering af sundhedsregistre.
